content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While discussing the rental price for this Duisburg apartment, let me emphasize its prime location, modern amenities, and the high demand for such accommodations in the city center. Keeping these factors in mind, I believe a competitive price would be around 1200 Euros per month. If this suits you, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
